medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The chest pain began after the ERCP procedure for elevated liver enzymes. The pain is described as substernal pressure, nonradiating, and similar to previous episodes of angina. It was initially not relieved by SL NTG, but was relieved with 4mg iv morphine.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Coronary artery disease (CAD) status post 8 cardiac stents, hypertension (HTN), hyperlipidemia (HL), non-insulin dependent diabetes mellitus (NIDDM), history of atrial fibrillation, and previous surgeries including cholecystectomy, appendectomy, and partial hysterectomy.
